Responsive Tables With Light Background

A .table-responsive ,.light-card inside table element.
@for (item of responsiveTablesBackground; track item) { }
Id Task Email Phone Assign Date Price Status Progress
{{item.id}} {{item.task}} {{item.email}} +91 {{item.phone}} {{item.assign}} {{item.date}} ${{item.price}} {{item.status}} {{item.progress}}
